articles.title: Watch Demi Moore’s Daughters React To Actress’s Golden Globes Win: “She Did It” - Deadline
articles.description: Demi Moore won best actress in a motion picture, musical or comedy at last night's Golden Globes.
articles.content:
Demi Moore landed her first Golden Globes win last night for The Substance, and her daughters — Scout, Tallulah, and Rumer Willis — have shared a now-viral video celebrating the milestone.

articles.description: “The Brutalist” director Brady Corbet took time from his acceptance speech to offer his condolences.

articles.title: Zoe Saldaña Gets Emotional During First-Ever Golden Globes Win: “My Heart Is Full of Gratitude” - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The 'Emilia Pérez' star praised her fellow nominees, including Selena Gomez and Ariana Grande, while accepting the prize for best supporting actress in a film.
articles.content:
Emilia Pérez star Zoe Saldaña got tearful while accepting her prize for best supporting actress in a motion picture at the 2025 Golden Globes.
“My heart is full of gratitude,” Saldaña said from the … [+1827 chars]
